  • Methodendetails

    • run

      public void run()
      This run method is responsible for bringing the player into the safe time, during which they cannot be attacked by any enemies. It reduces the player's opacity and uses a loop to check how long the safe time should last.
      Angegeben von:
      run in Schnittstelle Runnable

    • setPlayerSpawn

      public void setPlayerSpawn(int x, int y)
      At this point, the player is placed in the game.
      Parameter:
      x -
      y -

    • changePlayerSize

      public void changePlayerSize(double playerSize)
      This method allows changing the player's size. The height and width of the player are set to the same value here.
      Parameter:
      playerSize -

    • checkPlayerLegalHeight

      public void checkPlayerLegalHeight()
      This method checks that the player has not fallen into the void.

      public void onPlayerSuccess()
